content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 4, Manchester City 3.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 4, Manchester City 3.
Offside, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Substitution, Liverpool. Ragnar Klavan replaces Sadio Mané.
James Milner (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by James Milner (Liverpool).
Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Nicolás Otamendi.
Foul by Adam Lallana (Liverpool).
Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Manchester City 3. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sergio Agüero with a cross.
Substitution, Liverpool. Adam Lallana replaces Mohamed Salah.
Offside, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva tries a through ball, but Kevin De Bruyne is caught offside.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Andrew Robertson.
Hand ball by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Offside, Liverpool. Loris Karius tries a through ball, but Mohamed Salah is caught offside.
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Manchester City 2. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.

Goal!  Liverpool 4, Manchester City 1. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from more than 35 yards to the centre of the goal.

Goal!  Liverpool 3, Manchester City 1. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Mohamed Salah.
Sadio Mané (Liverpool) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box.
Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.

Goal!  Liverpool 2, Manchester City 1. Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain with a through ball following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Kyle Walker.
